§ 940i. Cybersecurity and grid security improvements(a) Definition of cybersecurity and grid security improvementsIn this section, the term “cybersecurity and grid security improvements” means investment in the development, expansion, and modernization of rural utility infrastructure that addresses known cybersecurity and grid security risks.
(b) Loans and loan guaranteesThe Secretary may make or guarantee loans under this subchapter and subchapter I for cybersecurity and grid security improvements.
(May 20, 1936, ch. 432, title III, § 319, as added Pub. L. 115–334, title VI, § 6507, Dec. 20, 2018, 132 Stat. 4775.)
